description.en: Investment-Attractive Plot with High Development Potential! The plot is located in a promising area, close to the sea and major cities. It is ideally suited for long-term investments and development projects. If purchased in full, the land can be divided into 18 individual plots. After subdivision, the estimated value of each plot is around 2 million TRY. The timeframe for completing all legal and administrative procedures is approximately 6 months. Don't miss the opportunity to invest in land with high growth potential and profitability!

Investment-Attractive Plot with High Development Potential! The plot is located in a promising area, close to the sea and major cities. It is ideally suited for long-term investments and development projects. The estimated timeframe for completing all legal and administrative procedures is approximately 6 months. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to invest in land with strong growth potential!

An investment plot in the village of Aydogan with a total area of 10,700 m¬≤ is offered for 25 million Turkish lira. The land can be divided into 45 individual plots, each of which can potentially be sold for approximately 1 million lira. If all plots are sold, the expected return is around 45 million lira. The property is located in a promising area with high growth and development potential. This is an excellent opportunity for investors interested in profitable and long-term investments.

A plot with permission for eco-tourism development within Istanbul ‚Äì by the sea and surrounded by nature! A unique investment opportunity in one of the most promising sectors ‚Äî eco-tourism. üìç The plot is located within the city limits of Istanbul, close to the sea and in a picturesque natural setting. üí∞ Price per square meter ‚Äî 6,500 TRY üè° Possibility to build 8 to 10 bungalows üíº Ideal for launching an eco-tourism project or for quick resale with profit. Similar plots in the area are being sold at prices starting from 10,000 TRY per m¬≤, making this offer particularly advantageous. Don‚Äôt miss the chance to invest in a high-demand project with strong growth potential!

This spacious 2+1 apartment offers 100 m¬≤ gross and 95 m¬≤ net living space. Located on the 3rd floor of a 5-story building, it features an elevator and open parking. The apartment comes with an open-plan (American-style) kitchen, air conditioning, and a balcony. The building is 11‚Äì15 years old, and there is 1 bathroom. Unfurnished and currently occupied by the owner, this property is ideal for comfortable city living.

This spacious 2+1 apartment offers 100 m¬≤ gross and 95 m¬≤ net living space. Located on the 3rd floor of a 5-story building, it features an elevator and open parking. The apartment comes with an open-plan (American-style) kitchen, air conditioning, and a balcony. The building is 11‚Äì15 years old, and there is 1 bathroom. Unfurnished and currently occupied by the owner, this property is ideal for comfortable city living.

Our apartment is a 3+1 reverse duplex, located close to the city center (just 10 minutes to Matantaly). It is near schools, a health clinic, all major markets, the local bazaar, and bus stops. Surrounded by numerous parks and green areas, the apartment is in a location that meets all your expectations. The apartment is move-in ready and requires no additional expenses. All windows are fitted with PVC frames, iron security bars, and shutters. Natural gas is available at the doorstep. A glass-enclosed balcony is included. Security cameras are installed throughout the building and in the garden.

Fully Furnished 1+1 Apartment in Lara, Antalya üìç Antalya ‚Äì Lara, Rauf Denktas Street üè† 50 m¬≤ | 2nd floor of a 3-story building üå≥ Panoramic windows with park view ü§´ No neighbors above or on one side ‚Äì peaceful and private apartment ‚úÖ Comes fully furnished and equipped with: Air conditioner Washing machine Refrigerator Dishwasher Water heater Stove and extractor hood üö∂ Within walking distance to 5 major supermarkets, parks, green areas, schools, hospitals, cafes, restaurants, and public transportation.

Fully furnished 3+1 apartment for sale in Lara. All furniture and appliances are brand new and under warranty, including 3 A++ air conditioners, fridge, dishwasher, and washing machine. Equipped with Creavit bathroom furniture, Bosch built-in kitchen appliances, electric fireplace, designer curtains, and a glass-enclosed balcony with furniture. The building offers open parking, disabled-accessible elevator, and 24/7 security cameras. High-quality construction with thermal and sound insulation, and natural gas at the doorstep. Excellent location: 3 minutes to the city center, 15 minutes to both Konyaaltƒ± and Lara beaches.

Modern and well-maintained 3+1 apartment with fresh paint and a central location. The property features 3 bathrooms, one of which has been converted into a storage room. Equipped with natural gas heating, mosquito screens, and iron security bars on all windows. Furnished with high-end luxury furniture and suitable for foreign buyers. Secure coded entry for both the building and the parking area. A perfect choice for comfortable living or investment.

Spacious and bright apartment with three-sided exposure, fully renovated ‚Äî like brand new inside! The natural gas combi boiler is active. The building is 10 years old and well-maintained. The complex is centrally located, very close to schools, shopping centers, and public transport. Features include a covered parking area, secure coded entry, video intercom system, water booster pump, central water purification system, and more ‚Äî perfect for comfortable and modern living.

Brand-new 2+1 apartment with an American-style kitchen, directly from the owner! The deed shows 101 m¬≤ net and 114 m¬≤ gross. Located on the 4th and 5th floors of a 5-storey building, facing northwest. The apartment includes 2 bathrooms, a separate walk-in closet, and offers views of the city and nature. Application for the technical passport has been submitted. The complex features a swimming pool, large parking area, two elevators, sauna, and fitness center. A perfect option for comfortable living or investment!

Prime location just 20 meters from Kleopatra Beach! This modern 1+1 apartment is in a new building and offers 46 m¬≤ net (52 m¬≤ gross) living space, with an open-plan kitchen, balcony, and 1 bathroom. The building features an elevator and open parking. Exceptional location with everything nearby ‚Äî sea, shops, restaurants, and walking paths. A perfect choice for holiday living, rental income, or seaside lifestyle!

Spacious and fully furnished 3+1 apartment located in the prestigious Kavi Dreams complex, offering 111 m¬≤ net (117 m¬≤ gross) of modern living space. Features an open-plan kitchen, 2 bathrooms, balcony, both open and closed parking, and an elevator. Situated in a 1-year-old building within a gated community. Currently owner-occupied. Monthly maintenance fee: 2,200 TL. A perfect choice for comfortable living or investment in one of the region's top-tier developments!

Spacious 3+1 apartment (140 m¬≤) on an elevated ground floor with southwest orientation, located just 1 km from the sea. Includes all white goods and air conditioners. Features an American-style kitchen with the option to convert into a separate kitchen. 1 bathroom/WC and 3 balconies. The complex offers a swimming pool, parking, elevator, generator, BBQ area, gazebo, and a beautifully maintained garden. Secure entry with code access. A private 12 m¬≤ enclosed storage unit is also included. An excellent opportunity for comfortable living close to nature and city amenities!

Luxury brand-new 3+1 apartment with a separate kitchen and balcony, located in the most exclusive part of Moda (Kadƒ±k√∂y), just 1 minute's walk from Yoƒüurt√ßu Park, the coastline, and top schools like Kadƒ±k√∂y Anadolu and Saint Joseph. Positioned on the raised first floor of a 2-storey building ‚Äî both secure and easily accessible. Underfloor heating, closed parking, 2 bathrooms (including en-suite) with Vitra and Artema fixtures. Siemens built-in appliances in the kitchen, tilt-and-turn Egepen windows with shutters, Buderus combi boiler with thermostat, and pre-installed air conditioning infrastructure. A rare opportunity for both family living and investment in the heart of Moda!

Modern brand-new 2+1 apartment with a closed kitchen and balcony, located on the 1st floor of an 11-storey building. Offers 113 m¬≤ gross and 76 m¬≤ net living space. Equipped with central heating for year-round comfort. The building includes an elevator and a secure indoor parking garage. A great choice for both family living and rental investment in a contemporary residential complex!

Brand-new 3+1 apartment (85 m¬≤ net, 115 m¬≤ gross) located on the 1st floor of a 15-storey building, right next to the Bostancƒ± metro station ‚Äî directly above the ‚ÄúSalon Model‚Äù hairdresser. The residence features open and closed parking, underfloor heating, generator, water tank, and two elevators. High-quality materials include √áanakkale ceramics, Vitra concealed cistern, Artema faucets, and √áamsan laminate flooring. A perfect choice for living or investment in one of Istanbul‚Äôs most accessible neighborhoods!

A luxurious 3+1 apartment with 115 m¬≤ net and 175 m¬≤ gross area, located just 50 meters from Marmara University and 250 meters from G√∂ztepe City Hospital. The building features compact laminate and ceramic fa√ßade, underground parking, generator, fire escape, 24/7 CCTV, hydrophore, one passenger and one freight elevator. The apartment includes hidden automatic shutters, extra-insulated comfort glass, Demird√∂k√ºm combi boiler, Mopa kitchen cabinetry, Siemens 4-piece built-in set (oven, stove, hood, dishwasher), Ideal Standard concealed cistern, H√ºppe shower system, Seranit ceramics. Master bedroom has en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. All rooms have satellite TV and fiber internet. With 3 frontages, it gets sunlight all day long ‚Äî a premium home in one of the most accessible spots on Istanbul‚Äôs Anatolian side! ƒ∞stersen bu ilan i√ßin detaylƒ± bir √∂zellik tablosu, afi≈ü tasarƒ±mƒ± ya da Yandex Ads ‚Äì SEO uyumlu kƒ±sa versiyon da hazƒ±rlayabilirim. Hazƒ±rsan devam edebiliriz.

Luxury furnished apartment for rent in Liderkent 3 residential complex. The apartment is fully equipped with brand new white goods and furniture. The complex offers a swimming pool, parking area, sports court, and 24/7 security. Surrounded by greenery, the apartment is bright, peaceful, and perfect for a comfortable lifestyle. Within walking distance to the sea, shopping centers, banks, Ya≈üam Hospital, restaurants, cafes, and entertainment venues.

Furnished 2+1 Apartment for Rent in Yeldeƒüirmeni, Kadƒ±k√∂y A fully furnished and move-in-ready 2+1 apartment is available for rent in the lively and unique neighborhood of Yeldeƒüirmeni, Kadƒ±k√∂y. 78 m¬≤ net living space 2 bedrooms and a living room Bright and spacious balcony All essential appliances: fridge, oven, dishwasher, washing machine Includes vacuum cleaner, iron, and other household items Walking distance to transportation, cafes, and markets Suitable for both short- and long-term rental A cozy and ready-to-live-in home in the heart of Kadƒ±k√∂y.

Light and cozy retro-style 2+1 apartment with a balcony, fully furnished and ready to move in, located just 100 meters from the Bull Statue and Bahariye Street, and 400 meters from the bar street ‚Äî all major public transportation is within walking distance. The apartment includes fresh bed linens and towels, hair dryer, iron, vacuum cleaner, TV, WiFi, Netflix, toast machine, Chemex coffee pot, electric kettle, dishes, and kitchen tools. Rental terms: 1-month deposit and 1-month rent in advance, available for both short- and long-term stays.

Fully furnished 1+1 apartment, move-in ready! Located on the 8th floor of a secure residential complex with a private pool, gym, and sauna. Total area: 75 m¬≤ (gross), 70 m¬≤ (net). Features an open-plan kitchen, sea-view balcony, and air conditioning. Just a short walk to the beach! Perfect for comfortable living or a holiday home.

This brand-new, fully furnished 2+1 luxury apartment is just 50 meters from the beach and offers breathtaking, uninterrupted views of the sea, mountains, and Alanya Castle from the living room and balcony. Located on the 3rd floor (physically 5th), the apartment features a custom interior design with handcrafted furniture, a 65" Samsung QLED TV, a real flame fireplace, Siemens Black Edition built-in appliances, Bocchi and Grohe bathroom fixtures, and three ultra-efficient Mitsubishi A+++ air conditioners. The residence includes a heated infinity pool, sea-view gym, stylish lobby, lounge, billiards, landscaped gardens, 24/7 security, and both open and closed parking. Every detail has been meticulously crafted with top global brands, offering a true work of art in one of Alanya‚Äôs most sought-after locations.

Spacious 2+1 brand-new apartment with 130 m¬≤ gross (120 m¬≤ net) on the elevated 2nd floor of a low-rise 4-story building. Although not inside a site, the property offers rich facilities including a swimming pool, sauna, Turkish bath, gym, children's playground, green areas, pergola, and open parking. Located in a rapidly developing area, the municipality is constructing a walking path and a large children's park right in front of the building, ensuring unobstructed mountain views thanks to the residential zoning restriction. The apartment features two bathrooms, an open-plan kitchen, a balcony, and is equipped with air conditioning. Offered unfurnished and ready for immediate occupancy ‚Äî ideal for those looking for long-term value and a serene setting near nature.

This fully furnished 2+1 luxury apartment is located on the 9th floor of a 12-story building, just 200 meters from the beach, 150 meters from the Saturday market, and 350 meters from Akdeniz Park Mall. Spanning 110 m¬≤ gross (95 m¬≤ net), the apartment features a separate modern kitchen with granite countertops, custom-designed furniture in every room, ceramic flooring, aluminum double-glazed windows, and a south-facing balcony offering natural light and beautiful views of nature, the city, and nearby parks. On-site amenities include both indoor and outdoor pools, sauna, steam and salt rooms, shock shower, fitness center, kids‚Äô playgrounds, billiards, table tennis, outdoor chess, gazebo, pool bar, stylish lobby, and 24/7 security with camera monitoring. Additional features: video intercom, water heater, generator, three fast elevators, and indoor/outdoor parking. Move-in ready, ideal for luxurious coastal living.

The only residential complex on the Antalya/Alanya coast with both summer and winter pools operating year-round ‚Äî no other premium complex offers this! This spacious 2+1 apartment (115 m¬≤) is located on the 10th floor and is fully ready for living. It features a cozy balcony and an 85-inch Samsung 4K TV worth over ‚Ç¨2000. The complex offers unmatched facilities including two open-air children‚Äôs pools with a total area of 182 m¬≤, water slides, a 200 m¬≤ indoor heated pool, a modern fitness center, Turkish bath (hammam), and a sauna that operates 7 days a week. For families and sports lovers, there are children‚Äôs playgrounds, tennis courts, volleyball and basketball courts. Safety is ensured with 24/7 security and video surveillance, while emergency generators and convenient parking add to your comfort. An ideal option for those seeking luxury, full-scale infrastructure, and year-round resort-style living by the sea!

Just bring your suitcase and move in ‚Äî everything is brand new! This stunning 2+1 duplex apartment is located on the 8th floor of a newly built 8-story building and offers 117 m¬≤ gross (110 m¬≤ net) of modern living space. Built in 2024, the apartment features 3 balconies, 1 bathroom, 2 WCs, an open-plan kitchen, and is positioned on the sunny southwest corner. All furnishings and appliances are brand new, and warranties will be activated upon purchase. Located just 500 meters from the sea, this fully furnished, never-used apartment also offers air conditioning, an elevator, and open parking. A perfect opportunity for both living and investment ‚Äî early congratulations to the lucky buyer!

Located in the sought-after Guzeloba, this fully furnished 2+1 terrace apartment stands out with its custom design and private, landscaped terrace ‚Äî currently used as an additional room with insulated glass and retractable awning. With 140 m¬≤ gross (120 m¬≤ net), this exclusive unit is the only apartment on its floor, offering maximum privacy. The home includes a stylish island kitchen, dressing room with new renovations, two bathrooms (one en-suite), and direct access from the underground parking garage. On-site amenities include an outdoor and indoor swimming pool, fitness center, sauna, children‚Äôs playground, security, generator, and more. Perfectly located near hospitals, schools, and markets, and suitable for foreign buyers. Comfort, style, and location ‚Äî all in one!

Move-in ready 2+1 apartment with open-plan kitchen, located on the top (3rd) floor of a brand-new building! This 80 m¬≤ (gross) / 65 m¬≤ (net) flat features a natural gas combi boiler with installed radiators, one brand-new air conditioner in the living room, double-glazed windows, and electric shutters. Ideal for city living, the apartment is just a short walk from local markets, primary and high schools, health center, the Metropolitan Municipality, MarkAntalya Shopping Mall, Kalei√ßi Old Town, and I≈üƒ±klar Street. With open parking, an elevator, and a spacious balcony, this is a perfect choice for both residence and investment in the heart of Antalya!

Spacious and well-maintained 3+1 apartment offering 145 m¬≤ gross (135 m¬≤ net) of comfortable living space, located on the 3rd floor of a 4-story building. The property features a separate closed kitchen, two bathrooms, natural gas combi heating system, a large balcony, elevator, and secure underground parking. Situated in a clean and quiet building, this unfurnished home is owner-occupied and ready for its new residents. Ideal for families looking for a functional, peaceful, and central living space.

This bright and spacious 2+1 ground-floor apartment with a pool view offers 110 m¬≤ gross (100 m¬≤ net) of summer-home comfort in a well-maintained complex. The property features an open-plan kitchen with built-in appliances, natural gas combi heating, solar energy support, hidden LED lighting, electric shutters, mosquito nets on all balcony doors and windows, and south-facing exposure. Interior highlights include a cloakroom, built-in wardrobes, and a balcony overlooking the pool. The site offers 24/7 security, camera surveillance, adult and children‚Äôs pools, a fitness center, children‚Äôs playground, pergolas, generator, and a dedicated closed parking space for each apartment. Ideally located within walking distance to Vakƒ±f Ya≈üam Hospital, ≈ûehit Atilla Nizam Clinic, markets, local bazaar, bus stops, schools, and sports facilities. A ready-to-move-in home with the charm of a holiday retreat!

This premium 3+1 ground-floor apartment offers 170 m¬≤ gross (150 m¬≤ net) of refined living space with first-class materials throughout, including full marble flooring in common areas, laminate parquet in bedrooms, and floor-to-ceiling marble in all three bathrooms (including one en-suite). Featuring panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, Viessmann inverter air conditioners in every room, a spacious closed kitchen, ECA combi boiler and natural gas system, a large balcony and terrace, LED and spot lighting, custom-built wardrobes and storage units, and a private 6 m¬≤ locked storage room in the basement. The property also includes a sheltered private parking space and a green, tree-lined front garden. Located just 3 minutes from the beach and within walking distance to Atat√ºrk Park (500 m), Varyant Terrace (600 m), Kalei√ßi Old Town (1.5 km), Beach Park (1.2 km), MarkAntalya Mall (1.9 km), tram station (150 m), and Y√ºz√ºnc√º Yƒ±l Avenue (50 m). A rare opportunity combining central location, design, and comfort!

Well-maintained and fully furnished 2+1 apartment with a separate kitchen, located on the 3rd floor of a 3-story building. The property features 88 m¬≤ gross (73 m¬≤ net) living space, 2 balconies ‚Äî one of which is large and enclosed with glass ‚Äî and private access to a 90 m¬≤ rooftop terrace. It has a natural gas stove heating system, 2 air conditioners, and comes fully equipped with all white goods (dishwasher, washing machine, combi boiler, refrigerator, microwave, oven, stove, extractor fan, TV) and IKEA furniture exactly as shown in the photos. The building has its own open parking area, a low monthly maintenance fee of just 200 TL, and is close to a tram line providing easy access to the airport. A weekly open-air market is set up nearby every Friday, and the historic city center is just a 15-minute walk away. Ideal for both living and investment!

This charming apartment is now available for sale, offering a comfortable living space with a gross area of 55 m¬≤ and a net area of 46 m¬≤. The property features a 1+1 room layout, perfect for small families or investors. Located on the garden floor of a 2-story building, this apartment is part of a well-maintained structure aged between 5-10 years. While heating is not available, the apartment includes an open-plan (American-style) kitchen, a bathroom, and a balcony. Additional conveniences include open parking, though there is no elevator. The property is unfurnished and is being sold directly by the owner. A great opportunity for those seeking a cozy home in a peaceful setting!

Our duplex apartment is located on the 3rd and 4th floors of a newly constructed, legal (occupancy-permitted) building with only 6 units, in the heart of Antalya. Within walking distance to Kalei√ßi, Doƒüu Garage, and I≈üƒ±klar Street, and just steps away from Anadolu Hospital (acquired by Ko√ß Holding). The apartment features 6 inverter air conditioners, a fully condensing Vaillant boiler, underfloor heating, motorized aluminum shutters, built-in kitchen set, and more. The building is earthquake-safe with a raft foundation and concrete beam flooring system. Interior includes 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, laundry room, terraces with foldable glass, and a quiet elevator.

This brand-new 2+1 apartment is located on the 9th floor of a newly completed 10-story building, just four buildings away from Anatolia Animal Hospital. The residence features an open-plan kitchen, natural gas combi heating, built-in kitchen set, and air conditioning. Each room is equipped with an automatic shutter system. The building offers both open and closed parking spaces and has two elevators. Conveniently located only 600 meters from Baƒüdat Avenue and Erenk√∂y Marmaray Station, 750 meters from the minibus road, and 1 km from Ay≈üe Kadƒ±n Metro Station.

Located on Rƒ±za Pa≈üa Street right on the tram line and very close to the beach, this sound- and heat-insulated 3+1 duplex apartment offers partial sea views and a net 110 m¬≤ of living space. The building has elevators on both levels. The lower floor features a balcony, while the upper floor has a spacious terrace with a storage area. The apartment includes a Franke built-in kitchen, a Buderus combi boiler, an en-suite bathroom, and automatic shutters in all rooms. The upper floor also offers a higher-than-standard ceiling, allowing the possibility of creating an additional room or a viewing area if desired.

Just a 3-minute walk from the metro, this functional and spacious 3+1 apartment comes with both open and closed parking, natural gas combi heating, and air conditioning units in the living room and master bedroom. It features an en-suite bathroom, a storage room, and has been recently renovated with top-quality bathroom cabinets and baseboards. The property includes a Siemens built-in kitchen set and offers low monthly maintenance fees, making it a practical and comfortable living space with no additional expenses.

Located on G√ºlibri≈üim Street‚Äîone of Ye≈üilk√∂y‚Äôs most distinguished streets‚Äîthis unique apartment occupies the entire second floor of a registered second-degree historical mansion. Offering a net 115 m¬≤ of elegant living space, the flat features 3 spacious rooms, a bright and charming living room with a bay window and custom-built divan, a separate functional kitchen, a balcony, one bathroom and an additional WC. The high ceilings (3 meters), large windows, and all-day sunlight enhance the sense of space. The apartment is fully renovated and move-in ready, with original polished parquet floors preserved in all rooms. While the building has no private parking, street parking is convenient, and an elevator is available. Just a 3-minute walk to the sea, surrounded by a calm and refined neighborhood, this is a rare opportunity to enjoy an independent and stylish lifestyle in a historic building.

This spacious and fully furnished 4+1 apartment is located on the 4th and top floor of a 26‚Äì30-year-old building with an elevator. Offering a net 130 m¬≤ of living space (160 m¬≤ gross), the property features a separate kitchen, two bathrooms, a balcony, and natural gas combi heating. The apartment is bright and well-maintained, currently owned and occupied by the homeowner. While there is no private parking, the building is equipped with an elevator and the flat is ready for immediate move-in.

This property is located in one of the most central and prestigious areas of Istanbul ‚Äì Be≈üikta≈ü. It is currently leased by Be≈üikta≈ü Sports Club with a rental agreement valid until 2027. The current monthly rental income is 600,000 TL. After the contract ends, the location offers excellent potential due to its high visibility and prime position.
